title: The Moon Landing Was Filmed in a Studio
description: Some believe Stanley Kubrick directed the moon landing in a secret NASA sound-stage.

title: The Earth Is Flat
description: A growing movement argues that Earth is not a sphere but a flat disc.

title: 9/11 Was an Inside Job
description: Some believe the U.S. government orchestrated the 9/11 attacks for political gain.

title: Chemtrails Are Poisoning Us
description: Contrails left by aircraft are thought to be chemical agents used for mind control or weather modification.

title: The Illuminati Controls the World
description: A secret elite group is said to control all major world events behind the scenes.

title: The Government Hides Alien Encounters
description: Many believe that extraterrestrial visits are routinely covered up by government agencies.

title: The Denver Airport Is an Illuminati Base
description: Denver International Airport is said to house secret underground bunkers and Illuminati symbols.

title: The COVID-19 Pandemic Was Planned
description: Some suggest the global pandemic was intentionally orchestrated to control populations.

title: Vaccines Contain Microchips
description: A fringe theory posits that COVID-19 vaccines are a method for governments to implant tracking chips.

title: Birds Aren’t Real — They're Drones
description: A satirical theory claims birds were replaced by drones for surveillance purposes.

title: The Titanic Was Swapped with the Olympic
description: Some believe the ship that sank was actually the RMS Olympic, switched to collect insurance money.

title: Paul McCartney Died in 1966
description: According to this theory, the real Paul died and was replaced by a lookalike.

title: The Mandela Effect Is Proof of Parallel Universes
description: Shared false memories are interpreted as evidence of alternate realities.

title: Elvis Presley Faked His Death
description: Fans claim Elvis went into hiding to escape fame and is still alive.

title: Area 51 Houses Alien Technology
description: The U.S. government is said to store and study alien spacecraft at Area 51.

title: Bigfoot Is Real and Hidden by the Government
description: Sightings of a giant humanoid creature suggest the government is concealing its existence.

title: The CIA Created HIV
description: The virus is believed by some to have been engineered by the CIA to target minority populations.

title: JFK Was Killed by the Deep State
description: The assassination was allegedly orchestrated by a secret faction within the government.

title: The U.S. Government Controls the Weather
description: Projects like HAARP are thought to be used to manipulate the weather for military purposes.

title: The Freemasons Run the World
description: A centuries-old fraternal group is believed to secretly control governments and economies.

title: Princess Diana Was Assassinated
description: It is believed she was killed to prevent scandal or to protect the monarchy's image.

title: The Moon Is a Hologram
description: A theory claims the moon is not real, but a projection created for unknown purposes.

title: Time Travel Is Being Hidden from the Public
description: Time travel allegedly exists but is kept secret by world powers.

title: The Government Can Read Minds with 5G
description: A theory suggests 5G networks are part of a mind control scheme.

title: The Rothschilds Control All Banks
description: The powerful Rothschild family is rumored to have control over global financial systems.

title: The Matrix Is Real
description: Reality is believed by some to be an artificial simulation.

title: Antarctica Is a Secret Nazi Base
description: Nazi forces are rumored to have built hidden bases in Antarctica during WWII.

title: The Government Uses MK-Ultra to Control Minds
description: The real MK-Ultra program has spawned beliefs about current mind control operations.

title: The Simpsons Predict the Future
description: The show has eerily predicted many real-life events, suggesting hidden knowledge.

title: The Real President Is a Clone
description: It’s theorized that world leaders have been replaced by clones.

title: Lizard People Rule the Earth
description: Shape-shifting reptilian aliens are believed to infiltrate high-ranking positions.

title: CERN Opened a Portal to Another Dimension
description: Some say CERN’s particle experiments are tearing holes in the universe.

title: COVID-19 Vaccines Cause Magnetism
description: Viral videos claim vaccinated individuals can attract metal objects.

title: Avian Flu Was a Bioweapon
description: Some believe avian flu outbreaks were artificially created.

title: NASA Is Lying About Space
description: NASA allegedly fakes images and hides the truth about space travel.

title: Hollow Earth Theory
description: The Earth is thought to be hollow and contain hidden civilizations.

title: The Queen Was a Reptilian
description: Some believe Queen Elizabeth II was a shape-shifting alien.

title: The Internet Is a Mind Control Tool
description: It is theorized that internet usage is manipulated to influence thoughts.

title: Hollywood Is Run by a Satanic Cult
description: Some claim that elite circles in Hollywood worship dark forces.

title: The Black Knight Satellite Is Watching Us
description: An object in orbit is believed to be an alien satellite monitoring Earth.

title: The U.S. Never Killed Osama Bin Laden
description: The reported killing of Bin Laden is believed to have been staged.

title: The Great Fire of London Was Planned
description: The fire was allegedly set deliberately to clear space for redevelopment.

title: The Moon Is an Artificial Satellite
description: Some think the Moon was built or placed in orbit by aliens.

title: Disney Freezes Walt Disney’s Body
description: The founder is rumored to be cryogenically frozen under Disneyland.

title: There Are Secret Bases on Mars
description: Mars is believed to host hidden military or alien outposts.

title: TWA Flight 800 Was Shot Down
description: Eyewitnesses and theorists claim the flight was downed by a missile.

title: The Georgia Guidestones Were a Globalist Message
description: The monument’s inscriptions are seen as evidence of elite agendas.

title: HAARP Can Cause Earthquakes
description: The HAARP facility is believed to have weaponized weather and seismic activity.

title: The Deep Web Is Controlled by the Government
description: It’s believed that intelligence agencies monitor and control hidden parts of the internet.

title: Celebrities Sell Their Souls for Fame
description: Success in showbiz is rumored to require pacts with dark forces.
